## CharityORG.embezzlements() method

Check or enable/dissable embezzlements.

**Signature:**

```typescript
embezzlements(state?: boolean): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | boolean | _(Optional)_ Set to this state, or if left empty returns current state. |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if embezzlements are on, false if off

## Remarks

RAM cost: 1GB

If no state is specified, will return the current state. If a state is specified, will change to that state and return the changed state.
